name: Expense Tracker API
desc: A backend RESTful API designed to securely track user expenses and financial transactions.

features.Scalability: Flyway for automated and version-controlled database migrations
features.Organisation: Record detailed transaction information for users

name: Personal Blog
desc: A minimalistic blog platform for viewing personal blog posts.

features.Readability: Uses color linted code blocks for clearer code

name: comfy-reader
desc: Comfy Reader is a web-based story and manga aggregator that brings content from multiple sources into one clean, unified platform. It enables users to search, preview, and download chapters from supported websites like bato.to and MangaDex.

features.Self-hosting: User can host the platform locally on their machine
features.Chapter Previews: Instantly preview chapters before committing to reading or downloading
features.Performance-Boosted: Reduces load times by 60% with Redis caching for search and page data
features.Reading History Tracking: Automatically records and displays your recently visited series
